classes.name: High School Workout
classes.description: Off-season workouts for high school gymnasts. Practice skills of all ranges in this semi-structured workshop.

classes.name: Parent & Child
classes.description: Children learn and play with a parent. The little ones practice jumping, hopping, rolling, balancing, and more.

classes.name: Preschool
classes.description: Co-ed clases teach coordination, balance, and body awareness. Students develop basic movement proficiency for gymnastics and other sports.

classes.name: Kindergym
classes.description: Students practics strength and agility exercises designed for further gymnastics progression on floor, bars, beam, vault, and rings.

classes.name: Girls Level 1
classes.description: Students practice basic skills on all four women's events: uneven bars, balance beam, floor exercise and vault. Light strength building exercises and conditioning teach students about general fitness.

classes.name: Girls Level 2/3
classes.description: Students work on round offs, back handsprings, bar circling skills, handstand vaulting, and more!

classes.name: Boys Beginner & Intermediate
classes.description: This class works on strength and basic skills for boys gymnastics. Students practice on the spring floor, vault, high bar, and rings.

classes.name: PreTeen Workshop
classes.description: For students who wish to practice recreational gymnastics at a beginner/intermediate level.

classes.name: Tumbling
classes.description: Beginning students work on rolls, walkovers, round-offs and handsprings. Advanced students practice tucks, layouts, aerials, and more!
